ingredients: 2.5 lbs dark roasted chestnut chips steeped at 160-170 degrees for 24 hours w/ amylase and pectinase
2 cups medium roasted buckwheat and 2 cups medium roasted millet steeped with 1 lb light roasted oats at 160-170 degrees for 60 min prior to boil
3 lbs 8 oz Sorghum Syrup (prior to boil)
2 lbs Dark Corn Syrup (prior to boil)
name: Gluten Free Brown Ale
